request.description:
##### **Description**

Request an access token / Login

##### Payload

| **Key** | **Validation** |
| --- | --- |
| email | string, email, optional |
| mobile_number | string, required if email is not passed |
| client_name | optional, string |
| with_user | optional, boolean |

response.name: Success

| email | string, required, unique |
| password | string, required |
| password_confirmation | string, required |
| first_name | string, required |
| last_name | string, required |
| middle_name | string, optional |
| client_name | string, optional |

request.description:
##### **Description** Update the profile information of the currently authenticated user **Payload** | **key** | **validation** | | --- | --- | | email | optional, email, unique | | first_name | optional, string | | last_name | optional, string | | middle_name | optional, string | | mobile_number | optional, mobile, internaltional format

ex.
+639064647223 | | telephone_number | optional, fixedLine, international format

ex.
+63272839123 | | sex | optional, "male" | "female" | | birthday | optional, Y-m-d, date must be before or equal today

ex.
1997-01-04 | | home_address | optional, string | | barangay | optional, string | | city_id | optional, `City ID` | | province_id | optional, `Province ID` | | region_id | optional, `Region ID` | | postal_code | optional, string | | profile_picture_path | optional, string |

request.description:
##### **Description** Update user information **Parameters** | **key** | **value** | | --- | --- | | api/v1/users/:id | ID of the user to be updated | Payload | **key** | **validations** | | --- | --- | | first_name | optional, string | | last_name | optional, string | | middle_name | optional, string | | email | optional,, email | | mobile_number | optional, mobile, international format

ex.
++639064748223 | | telephone_number | optional, fixedLine, international format

ex.
+63272839123 | | sex | optional, \`male\` | | birthday | optional, Y-m-d, not greater than today

ex.
1997-12-20 | | home_address | optional, string | | barangay | optional, string | | city_id | optional, `City ID` | | province_id | optional, `Province ID` | | region_id | optional, `Region ID` | | profile_picture_path | optional, string | | active | optional, boolean | | email_verified | optional, boolean | | roles | optional, array of `Role IDs`ex.
`[1, 2, 3]` | | password | optional, mixed case + numbers, min of 8, max 100, string | | password_confirmation | same as `password` |

response.name: Success

ex.
+63272839123 | | sex | optional, \`male\` | | birthday | optional, Y-m-d, not greater than today

ex.

`[1, 2, 3]` | | password | required, mixed case + numbers, min of 8, max 100, string | | password_confirmation | required, same as `password` |
